# The `MCSectionMachO` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This represents a section on a Mach-O system (used by Mac OS X). <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::MCSectionMachO</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This represents a section on a Mach-O system (used by Mac OS X).

On a Mac system, these are also described in /usr/include/mach-o/loader.h.

Definition at line 24 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcsectionmacho-h">MCSectionMachO.h</a>.

### ParseSectionSpecifier() {#a1ea0b527a25e96bb74c8217704b22a07}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Error MCSectionMachO::ParseSectionSpecifier (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Spec, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> &amp; Segment, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> &amp; Section, unsigned &amp; TAA, bool &amp; TAAParsed, unsigned &amp; StubSize)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Parse the section specifier indicated by &quot;Spec&quot;.

ParseSectionSpecifier - Parse the section specifier indicated by &quot;Spec&quot;.

This is a string that can appear after a .section directive in a mach-o flavored .s file. If successful, this fills in the specified Out parameters and returns an empty string. When an invalid section specifier is present, this returns an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> indicating the problem. If no TAA was parsed, TAA is not altered, and TAAWasSet becomes false.

This is a string that can appear after a .section directive in a mach-o flavored .s file. If successful, this fills in the specified Out parameters and returns an empty string. When an invalid section specifier is present, this returns a string indicating the problem.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcsectionmacho-h/#l00071">71</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcsectionmacho-h">MCSectionMachO.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/mc/mcsectionmacho-cpp/#l00181">181</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/mc/mcsectionmacho-cpp">MCSectionMachO.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
